summary: This document is a Bureau of Prisons count sheet and related forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, dated August 14, 2019. It records inmate population counts and unit assignments, and includes a specific roster entry for an inmate assigned to 'SUICIDE OR UNASSG' watch, which is significant given the context of Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody.

events.title: Daily Inmate Count at MCC New York
events.description: Routine official inmate population count conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, showing a total census of 759 inmates verified.

events.title: Inmate Placed on Suicide Watch
events.description: An inmate roster entry shows an inmate (REG NO: KOS-133U) was assigned to 'SUICIDE OR UNASSG' (Suicide or Unassigned) watch on this date.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: The document is dated August 14, 2019, the day after Jeffrey Epstein was found dead in his cell at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.
An inmate roster shows an inmate (REG NO: KOS-133U) was assigned to 'SUICIDE OR UNASSG' watch on August 14, 2019.
The total inmate census for the facility on this date was recorded as 759 inmates, verified by count.
The document consists of official Bureau of Prisons administrative forms for inmate counts and assignments.
No specific inmate names are listed in the provided text excerpts; only register numbers and unit codes are visible.
